mlog
Class MouseLogger

java.lang.Object
  mlog.MouseLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MouseLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Uses a HashMap of PixelPoints and Integers to log mouse pointer positions over time.

Version:
2013-05-16
Author:
Filip Östermark

Constructor Summary
MouseLogger(long sleepTimeMillis)
          Creates a new MouseLogger that logs the mouse pointer position with a given time interval.

Constructor Detail

Creates a new MouseLogger that logs the mouse pointer position with a given time interval.

isRunning

public boolean isRunning()
Returns:
True if the mouse is being logged, false if not.

getTotalRuntime

public int getTotalRuntime()
Returns:
The total time that the mouse has been logged.

printLog

public void printLog()
Prints the current log of mouse pointer positions on the standard output stream. The list can potentially become very long for users with big resolutions. Should mostly be used for debugging.

getPixelTimeLog

public java.util.HashMap<PixelPoint,java.lang.Integer> getPixelTimeLog()
Returns:
The log of the mouse pointer positions over time.
